commentBody:
It all started when I was nine years old and Flash Gordon mentioned to be quarterback of the NY Jets, AFN then showed us what Football is (if you could rigg your TV for reception) my best friend turned out to become headcoach of the nastonal youth team and I eventually got see the real, live Jets while studying in NYC in the 90's.
I don't know how it happend but this season I really started to care, got my NFL season pass, followed the press, the stories, finally players that I liked, a coach I could respect - I fell in Love. And yesterday it hurt - I can't really say why, because I should have known once my little daughter asked my who I thought would win and I couldn't bring myself to answer. When it was over I sat there and was actually heartbrocken.
And I already know I will be back next season ... and I will keep coming back and cheer at my screen from 11.000 miles away - thank you for a great ride and an amazingly entertaining season when I was proud to be a Jet Fan! I love you guys - see in the Fall (or Pro Bowl) !
